amendment.description: Amendment authorizes $100,000 for the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration to conduct a three year study to assess the long-term trends in frequency and severity of inland flooding and to determine how shifts in climate and other factors might make certain regions vulnerable to escalating flood damage in the future.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide $100,000 shall be available to assess through research and analysis the long-term trends in frequency and severity of inland flooding; and how shifts in climate, development, and erosion patterns might make certain regions vulnerable to more continual flood damage in the future.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
